attributes.action: if students go back to school’s exams will still be used with mock grades (etc)
attributes.additional_details: Government should give GCSE, A-level and university students more conformation that if we do go back to school’s that we won’t have to do our GCSEs as lots of us won’t have been preparing because of this stressful time
attributes.background: Even if students go back to school’s at some point we will still be graded by our mock grades (etc) and won’t do exams as nobody has been preparing for them

rejection.details: Since you started your petition the Government has confirmed that GCSE exams for 2019-20 will not take place and that students will be given calculated grades. Find out more: https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/coronavirus-covid-19-cancellation-of-gcses-as-and-a-levels-in-2020/coronavirus-covid-19-cancellation-of-gcses-as-and-a-levels-in-2020.
